programme.desc: Director Chor Yuen reunites with novelist, Gu Long, and superstar, Ti Lung, in this exciting sequel to Clans of Intrigue.

programme.title: Torrent of Desire
programme.desc: Flames of lust burn strongly in this high-octane melodrama that stars Jenny Hu, Yang Fan and Qiao Zhuang.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: Witness the exploits of Chan Chao, an advocate of justice who thwarts the plans of Minister Peng to assassinate the revered Judge Pao Cheng over and over again.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: This drama centres on the seductive Judy. A woman with a rich husband, she also has two lovers who happen to be brothers!

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: In this gem from Chang Cheh, it's a battle between security agencies and five powerful fighters as they brawl until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Sisterhood

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: This award-winning movie tells the story of Yuddy, an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to find his mother.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: When Sun Meet Moon

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit

programme.title: She Remembers, He Forgets
